DOC.detailed_description: Adult primary unilateral TKA patient less 90° knee flexion 5 12 week index surgery screen trial eligibility base inclusion exclusion criterion . Only patient protocol surgeon eligible participate trial . MUA perform prior 12 week index TKA . Patients randomize either oral colchicine 0.6 mg twice daily 6 week ( treatment arm ) oral placebo twice daily 6 week placebo arm . All patient follow standardize post-MUA physical therapy protocol . Data collect prospectively , include study data collection sheet medication diary . Other data source include office inpatient medical record , operative report , physical therapy record , hospital picture archive communication system ( PACS ) radiology record . Outcomes collect MUA , 6 week , 3 month , 1 year .
